document_data.mainbody:
Thane of Westgate was an employee of Auroras Emporium in 1370 DR.
Thane joined the Emporiums staff in 1365 DR as a master of the central warehouse, a role that suited him perfectly thanks to his eye for detail. He was anxious only at the annual relocation of operations to a new city. In time, Thane became very rich and most rumors said that he would abandon the business after a few years to dedicate himself to his studies.
